meanings.definition: Discover or obtain by searching or exploring.
meanings.sent1: She outfinds new treasures in the forest every weekend.
meanings.sent2: He outfinds interesting facts during his research.
meanings.sent3: The detective outfinds the missing clue hidden in plain sight.
meanings.sent4: Her intuition outfinds the truth behind every mystery.
meanings.sent5: The explorer outfinds ancient artifacts buried deep underground.

meanings.definition: To surpass in finding or discovering.
meanings.sent1: Their team always outfinds the competition in scavenger hunts.
meanings.sent2: The scientist outfinds his colleagues in making groundbreaking discoveries.
meanings.sent3: The student outfinds all the answers in record time during the quiz.
meanings.sent4: His determination outfinds any obstacles in his path to success.
meanings.sent5: The inventor outfinds new solutions to old problems with innovative ideas.
